segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar, and I’m terrified he’s going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he’s stretching so far—it’s making my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don’t know how the woman can be so calm with all this happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she’s just drying dishes like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t hurt himself—he’s so close to losing his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are so focused on those cookies, they don’t even see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would step in and help before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
